sentences.en: The film is autobiographical and the central character is played by Collard himself.
sentences.cn: 这部影片是自传式的，主角由科勒德亲自扮演。

sentences.en: The types of socialexperiences children have do factor into the development of autobiographical memories.
sentences.cn: 儿童的社会经验类型在自传体记忆的发展中起着重要的作用。

sentences.en: In his spare time, he visited the local art galleries, and the paintings are now lodged deep in his autobiographical memories.
sentences.cn: 他在空余时间参观了当地的美术馆，现在这些画作还深深地铭刻在他的自传体记忆中。
